Title: The Affair
Writer: David West Read, Eugene Levy (created by), Dan Levy (created by), Matt Kippen (executive story editor), Monica Heisey (story editor), Alyssa Pankiw (story editor), Zoe Whittall (story editor)
Actors: Eugene Levy, Catherine O'Hara, Dan Levy, Annie Murphy
Plot: Moira and Roland find themselves in a compromising situation. Alexis drives a wedge between David and Patrick.
